actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to establish a uniform poll closing time throughout the continental United States for Presidential general elections.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to require each polling place in the continental United States to close at ten o'clock p.m. Eastern Standard Time with respect to presidential general elections. Permits earlier closing of a polling place at which each person who is eligible to vote has voted, as provided by the State law in which the polling place is located.

titles.title: A bill to establish a uniform poll closing time throughout the continental United States for Presidential general elections.
